data.actual_result: The blue circle stays and doesn't disappear until you press "save"
data.expected_result: The group DM icon you changed appears as opposed to the blue circle representing a blank icon
data.short_description: DM Group logo doesn't appear when you change it
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a group DM - Go to the group DM settings screen - 'Change' the group DM icon
